report.title: Occurrences Download with parent sample support
report.description: Report suitable for downloading data, compatible with the explore report parameters, where sample attributes come from a parent sample.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences o JOIN occurrences occ on occ.id=o.id AND occ.deleted=false JOIN samples schild on schild.id=o.sample_id AND schild.deleted=false JOIN samples s on s.id=schild.parent_id AND s.deleted=false JOIN websites w on w.id=o.website_id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND o.record_status not in ('I','T') AND (#ownData#=1 OR o.record_status not in ('D','R')) AND ('#searchArea#'='' OR st_intersects(o.public_geom, ST_MakeValid(st_geomfromtext('#searchArea#',900913)))) AND (#ownData#=0 OR CAST(o.created_by_id AS character varying)='#currentUser#') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' or '#date_from#'='Click here' or o.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' or '#date_to#'='Click here' or o.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND quality_check('#quality#', o.record_status, o.certainty)=true #idlist#

param.name: date_from
param.description: Filter by record added or updated date

param.name: date_to
param.description: Filter by record added or updated date

param.name: quality
param.description: Quality level required of data to be included in the map.
param.lookup_values: V:Data must be verified,C:Data must be verified or certain,L:Data must be at least likely,!D:Include anything not dubious or rejected,!R:Include anything not rejected

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: idlist
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence IDs to filter to.

param.name: currentUser
param.description: Current user's warehouse ID. Allows a column to be output indicating that the user owns the record.

param.name: location_id
param.description: Provide the location to display records for

param.name: ownLocality
param.join: JOIN locations lfilter ON st_intersects(lfilter.boundary_geom, o.public_geom) AND lfilter.id=#location_id#

param.name: taxon_groups
param.description: List of taxon group IDs to view data for

param.name: surveys
param.description: List of survey IDs to view data for

column.name: sample_id
column.sql: case when o.sensitivity_precision is null then o.sample_id else null end

column.name: entered_sref
column.sql: case when o.sensitivity_precision is null and o.privacy_precision is null then o.public_entered_sref else 'Sensitive' end

column.name: recorder
column.sql: CASE WHEN w.id IN (#website_ids#) THEN '' ELSE w.title || '->' END || o.recorders

column.name: record_status
column.sql: CASE o.record_status WHEN 'V' THEN 'Verified' WHEN 'D' THEN 'Dubious' WHEN 'R' THEN 'Rejected' WHEN 'I' THEN 'In progress' WHEN 'C' THEN 'Complete' WHEN 'S' THEN 'Awaiting check' ELSE o.record_status END

column.name: belongs_to_user
column.sql: CASE CAST(o.created_by_id AS character varying) WHEN '#currentUser#' THEN true ELSE false END

column.name: certainty
column.sql: CASE o.certainty WHEN 'C' THEN 'Certain' WHEN 'L' THEN 'Likely' WHEN 'U' THEN 'Uncertain' END

column.name: strokecolor
column.sql: case o.record_status when 'C' then case o.certainty when 'C' then 'green' when 'L' then 'orange' when 'U' then 'red' else 'blue' end when 'V' then 'green' when 'D' then 'orange' when 'R' then 'red' else 'black' end

column.name: fillcolor
column.sql: case o.record_status when 'V' then 'green' when 'D' then 'orange' when 'R' then 'red' else 'blue' end
